item.description:
Calling all Turkey Lovers, Pie Eaters, and Those Crazy for Cranberries!

Thanksgiving Week Join the Pilates instructors and Personal trainers for a fun combination cardio- and resistance-training class.
 
Modern Pilates and Bodyscapes will give you a jump start working off your Thanksgiving Feast.   It will be a special fitness class incorporating cardio, equipment Pilates, and resistance training all in one hour of intensive movement.
 
A must before sitting down to a Thanksgiving Feast. Join in the fun!
 
Wednesday November 24th  8am

If you are unable to join the group on Wednesday they are also running the program Thursday morning at 8:30am
 
In the sprit of the holiday please bring a donation of non-perishable food for the Hingham Food Pantry.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the entryway at the bottom of the stairs

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Pilates and Personal Training
